etlConventions: If the cause of death was coded using a Vocabulary present in the OMOP Vocabularies put the CONCEPT_ID representing the cause of death here.
sourceConceptRecordCompletenessNotes: Threshold updated to 15% as many conditions are mapped manually and do not have source concepts.

userGuidance: This field houses the verbatim value from the source data representing the procedure that occurred. For example, this could be an CPT4 or OPCS4 code.
etlConventions: Use this value to look up the source concept id and then map the source concept id to a standard concept id.
sourceValueCompletenessNotes: Updated the thresholds to capture the expected state of mapping for the data source 2025S1
